channel.title: Ads on Soundcloud- Yes or No?
channel.description:
Do you avoid listening to an artist's songs if you know you'll have to listen to an ad? Do ads turn you away from an artist? Or do you not care about ads, and just listen anyway?
Just wondering what people think.

item.title: Ads on Soundcloud- Yes or No?
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
Well aint this ironic

Read full topic
item.source: Ads on Soundcloud- Yes or No?

item.title: Ads on Soundcloud- Yes or No?
item.dc:creator: AzureOnyx
item.description:
Ads on any app can show what kinda app the developers are trying to convey. Apps like SoundCloud are fine when it comes to ads because it’s a social program.
However, when it comes to apps like Auxy, who wants to help creators create music, ads are seen as a distraction. That, of course will risk the app of being prone to a subscription service since there isn’t any ad to be seen.

Read full topic
item.source: Ads on Soundcloud- Yes or No?

item.title: Ads on Soundcloud- Yes or No?
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
Produk:

Do you avoid listening to an artist’s songs if you know you’ll have to listen to an ad?

I thought the ad’s are automatic and aren’t tied to any particular song tho. It’s how Soundcloud makes $$. Like i get an ad every 5ish songs and it’s not for the same track, so idk what artists have been using ads but i haven’t heard any that were tied to a track

Read full topic
item.source: Ads on Soundcloud- Yes or No?
